meta.description: Optimize the purchase of properties to maximize annual income within a budget constraint.

sets.name: PROPERTIES
sets.description: Set of properties available for purchase.

params.name: annual_income
params.description: Annual income generated by each property.

params.name: budget
params.description: Total budget available for purchasing properties.

vars.name: buy
vars.description: Binary decision variable indicating whether to purchase each property.

objective.name: max_annual_income
objective.description: Maximize the total annual income from purchased properties.

constraints.name: budget_constraint
constraints.description: Total cost of purchased properties must not exceed the budget.

constraints.name: property_4_excludes_3
constraints.description: If Property 4 is purchased, Property 3 cannot be purchased.
